恩返し: (ongaeshi) - requital of a favour (favor), repayment (de uma obrigação, gentileza, etc.)
恩返しをする: (おんがえしをする) - to return a favor (favour); to repay
恩送り: (おんおくり) - pay it forward; paying it forward; repaying a good deed by doing good for others
恩頼: (みたまのふゆ) - divine grace; divine protection; boon from the gods (or the emperor, etc.)
恬淡虚無: (てんたんきょむ) - (yoji) rising above the trivia of life and remaining calm and selfless
恭倹: (きょうけん) - respectfulness and modesty; deference
恭賀新年: (きょうがしんねん) - Happy New Year
息がかかる: (いきがかかる) - to have the personal support of (an influential person); to be under the patronage of
息が切れる: (いきがきれる) - to run out of breath/to be short of breath/to lose one's breath; to run out of steam/to be unable to continue/to collapse; to die
息が合う: (いきがあう) - to (work, talk, etc.) together smoothly
息が掛かる: (いきがかかる) - to have the personal support of (an influential person); to be under the patronage of
息が詰まる: (いきがつまる) - to choke; to have trouble breathing
息せき切る: (いきせききる) - to pant; to gasp
息つく: (いきつく) - to take a breath; to take a short rest
息づく: (いきづく) - to breathe (heavily)/to pant/to gasp/to sigh; (息づく only) to live
息づまる: (いきづまる) - to be breathtaking; to be stifling
息の合った: (いきのあった) - in good coordination
息の根を止める: (いきのねをとめる) - to kill; to choke the life out of
息ぴったり: (いきぴったり) - perfectly in sync; in step (dancing); on the same wavelength
息む: (いきむ) - to strain (e.g. with constipation); to bear or push down (during childbirth)
息をつく: (いきをつく) - to take a breath; to take a short rest
息をつぐ: (いきをつぐ) - to take a breath; to pause for a breath; to catch one's breath
息をのむ: (いきをのむ) - to catch one's breath; to gulp; to have one's breath taken away; to gasp
息をひそめる: (いきをひそめる) - to hold one's breath; to bate one's breath
息を付く: (いきをつく) - to take a breath; to take a short rest
息を切らす: (いきをきらす) - to be out of breath
息を合わせる: (いきをあわせる) - {sumo} to synchronise the breathing with the opponent prior to the start of a match
息を吐く: (いきをはく) - to breathe out; to exhale
息を吹き返す: (いきをふきかえす) - to resume breathing; to come around; to come back to life
息を呑む: (いきをのむ) - to catch one's breath; to gulp; to have one's breath taken away; to gasp
息を嚥む: (いきをのむ) - to catch one's breath; to gulp; to have one's breath taken away; to gasp
息を引き取る: (いきをひきとる) - to pass away; to breathe one's last
息を弾ませる: (いきをはずませる) - to pant; to gasp; to be short of breath; to be excited
息を殺す: (いきをころす) - to hold one's breath; to catch one's breath
息を潜める: (いきをひそめる) - to hold one's breath; to bate one's breath
息を継ぐ: (いきをつぐ) - to take a breath; to pause for a breath; to catch one's breath
息を荒げる: (いきをあらげる) - to breathe heavily
息を詰める: (いきをつめる) - to hold one's breath
息を飲む: (いきをのむ) - to catch one's breath; to gulp; to have one's breath taken away; to gasp
息付く: (いきつく) - to take a breath; to take a short rest
息切れ: (いきぎれ) - shortness of breath/panting/puffing; running out of steam (e.g. economy)/losing momentum
息吐く: (いきつく) - to take a breath; to take a short rest
息吹: (いぶき) - breath; sign (of something new and fresh)/breath (metaphor)
息吹き: (いぶき) - breath; sign (of something new and fresh)/breath (metaphor)
息巻く: (いきまく) - to rage/to storm (at)/to be furious; to enthuse/to speak passionately/to get worked up/to galvanize
息張る: (いきばる) - to strain; to bear down (in giving birth)
息急き切る: (いきせききる) - to pant; to gasp
息抜き: (いきぬき) - taking a breather; relaxation; vent hole
息災延命: (そくさいえんめい) - (yoji) health and longevity; enjoying a long and healthy life being untouched by disaster
息白し: (いきしろし) - visible breath (i.e. when it's cold); frosty breath; white breath
息絶える: (いきたえる) - to die; to lay down life's burden
息継ぎ: (いきつぎ) - a breather; a breathing spell
息苦しい: (いきぐるしい) - choking; oppressive; suffocating

息詰まる: (いきづまる) - to be breathtaking; to be stifling
息込む: (いきごむ) - to be enthusiastic about; to be eager; to be keen
恰も: (あだかも) - (usu. as あたかものようだ, あたかものごとし, etc.) as if/as it were/as though; right then/just then/at that moment
恰好: (カッコ) - shape/form/figure/posture/pose; appearance; state/situation; suitable/fit/reasonable; (after an age) about
恰好付ける: (かっこつける) - to affect a stylish air; to try to look good; to show off
恵: (kei/e/megu) - favor , wisdom, enlightenment; prajñā (one of the three divisions of the noble eightfold path), wisdom
恵まれた人々: (めぐまれたひとびと) - blessed people; favored (privileged) people (favoured)
